EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Enrollment (1328563438.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi George,
Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to follow up on you MBO enrollment – once I have the I-9 form I will be able to activate your account and get you billing.
Please contact me with any questions.
Thanks, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, February 03, 2012 12:54 PM To: 'George Owens' Subject: RE: MBO Enrollment
Hi George,
I just left you a voicemail. Thank you for completing the online enrollment. The last step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents (also attached above); you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.)
Once I have a copy of this signed form I can activate your account and walk you through the billing process. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions.
Thanks! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: George Owens [mailto:georgeowens@optonline.net] Sent: Thursday, February 02, 2012 6:05 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Enrollment
Actually I do. When I completed the enrollment I had printer problems and I was unable to print the required forms. Can I call you in the morning, so I can finally complete this I get my billing in? From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, February 02, 2012 5:21 PM To: georgeowens@optonline.net Subject: RE: MBO Enrollment
Hi George,
Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to reach out and touch base. Please let me know if you have any questions for me.
Take care! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
